ECILC.IS.long_name: EIS Eczacibasi Ilaç, Sinai ve Finansal Yatirimlar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ECILC.IS.summary: EIS Eczacibasi IlaÃ§, Sinai ve Finansal Yatirimlar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with subsidiaries, engages in health and real estate development businesses primarily in Turkey. The company's Health segment produces and sells human health and veterinary medicines. Its Real Estate Development segment develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. EIS Eczacibasi IlaÃ§, Sinai ve Finansal Yatirimlar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Eczacibasi Holding A.S.
